channel.title: Joana/Mancow's Leveling guide for Horde world of warcraft
channel.description:
hay well i have had the 1 - 60 for a while i got it off of gotee but only started using it a few days ago when i started again and im levelling quick so i would like to know if any one has the 60 -70 one i think it comes in an update guide which will be 1 - 70 any one have it?
p.s sorry for fucking the question bored up last night lol i had a thread with 214748365 pages :D popular me if you want to see the pic them ill post it

item.title: Joana/Mancow's Leveling guide for Horde world of warcraft
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:9, topic:102696”]To the people that say it’s just a list of quests, I wonder what they expected - levelling = doing lots of quests. What Joana gives you is the best order to do them in, and it does work, it’s saved me a bunch of time on alts.

I’m uploading all 3 as we speak anyway, in case anyone does want it.[/quote]

No need to upload 1-60 I’m almost done with that one…

And I haven’t played WoW so I wouldn’t know :D.

MediaFire: 1-60
http://www.mediafire.com/?70j4gkm0xwj

Read full topic

item.title: Joana/Mancow's Leveling guide for Horde world of warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

To the people that say it’s just a list of quests, I wonder what they expected - levelling = doing lots of quests. What Joana gives you is the best order to do them in, and it does work, it’s saved me a bunch of time on alts.

I’m uploading all 3 as we speak anyway, in case anyone does want it.

item.source: Joana/Mancow's Leveling guide for Horde world of warcraft

item.title: Joana/Mancow's Leveling guide for Horde world of warcraft
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

But honestly the level 60-70 one isnt even a walkthrough. he just list every quest in outland and that is basically it.
Yeah I've seen the 60-70 portion. It's really just the quests that you should do, so you're best off just doing every quest that isn't a group quest and you'll get about the same results as the guide. Sometimes though there are quests in TBC that are wayyyyyyyyy too hard for a solo, so any quest that's a little out of your range is a no-no at least for a little. Either way, I did it without a guide in about a week.

BTW I don’t play WoW but… Give me 10 minutes to upload the book, Downloading it right now…

Read full topic
